alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 30 at 5:08AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tensas, Concordia and central Catahoula Parishes, west central Jefferson and northwestern Adams Counties through 615 AM CST... At 508 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Monterey, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Deer Park around 515 AM CST. Frogmore around 525 AM CST. Ferriday and West Ferriday around 530 AM CST. Clayton, Spokane and Lee Bayou around 540 AM CST. Waterproof around 550 AM CST. Helena around 555 AM CST. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sicily Island and Ridgecrest. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
